last_episode_to_air.name: Arctic
last_episode_to_air.overview: A team of expert engineers are abandoned in Arctic conditions in a simulated crash site, with the leftovers of a light aircraft and two snow mobiles. Their only chance of escape is to create a vehicle from the wreckage. Ex-Special Forces soldier and survival expert Ant Middleton oversees the team of three men and two women, who each bring a specific skill to the team - from aircraft mechanics to vehicle engineering. But as the freezing conditions close in, debilitating the group, the engineers are unable to agree on what to construct, and increasingly escape looks unlikely.

name: Escape
overview: Five engineers stranded in the middle of hostile dessert terrain, surrounded by the wreckage of a vehicle, have only one way to survive - build a new machine and get out of there.

episodes.name: Desert
episodes.overview: Five engineers have to build a machine from a wrecked vehicle to escape from a remote desert.

episodes.name: Mountains
episodes.overview: The engineers are confident they can overcome both the harsh environment and the engineering challenges, but as the climate takes its toll, physically and mentally, the reality of what they've facing starts to bite.

episodes.name: Jungle
episodes.overview: Deep in the heart of a remote jungle, ex-special forces soldier Ant Middleton and five expert engineers are stranded in a simulated crash site where a flash flood has caused vehicles to fall into a crocodile-infested river. The engineers, three womenâ€¦

episodes.name: Desert Island
episodes.overview: Five highly skilled engineers are abandoned on a desert island. The ground conditions are extreme as five abandoned engineers seek to build an escape craft out of ship wreckage.
